heading.message:
Know your Kubernetes 
clusters inside out

subtitle.message: UnDistro is a Getup.io backed initiative to create products that help you manage your Kubernetes environment in a simple and centralized way.

zora.title.message: The first product created by Undistro is Zora.

zora.description.message: Zora periodically scans all of your Kubernetes clusters, looking for potential issues or vulnerabilities with deployed resources and configurations, helping you ensure compliance with best practices and preventing security, allocation, and misconfiguration problems.

zora.features.items.0.description.message: Following Undistro's concept of centralized visualization, Zora brings a view of all your clusters, with the main data and number of issues

zora.features.items.1.description.message: Zora shows you all issue details: category, severity, and all affected resources. With this data, you can analize the exact component that you need to fix.

zora.features.items.2.description.message: If you prefer, you can view all your issues in a single list, without having to select each cluster.

zora.features.items.3.description.message: If you don’t know why an issue is a problem for your cluster, we present reliable documentation that will help you understand what that vulnerability could cause to your environment.

timeline.items.0.description.message: We’re happy to announce Zora’s first alpha version. It is a working product, but it there’s still a few features missing. Everyone can test it out via our documentation.

timeline.items.1.description.message: To help you to solve your issues, we are creating a orientation guide that will help you to solve them and avoid bigger problems to your environment.

timeline.items.2.description.message: Possibility to edit existing issues (enable and disable them, edit criticality, category), allowing the user to customize their dashboard according to what is most relevant to their environment.

timeline.items.3.description.message: Today we are using Popeye as our only source of vulnerabilities, but we are creating a “Zora” plugin (through Zora syntax), with our own checks, always up to date to the last disclosed k8s vulnerabilities.

timeline.items.4.description.message: Possibility to create your own customized checks, also through the Zora syntax.

timeline.items.5.description.message: Connect a cluster, create a new issue, edit settings, environments and issues directly via interface. Let your non-technical colleagues join the party with our friendly and intuitive interface.

timeline.items.6.description.message: Possibility to filter issues that only affect a specific namespace.

timeline.items.7.description.message: A new version with access control. You’ll be able to share the same dashboard with other people within your team.

timeline.items.8.description.message: Integration with Grafana and Prometheus for exporting metrics, and visualizing data in a personalized and editable way

timeline.items.9.description.message:
At that time, we will be ready to release a beta version that will have all the previous features. 
After that, the sky's the limit! We will evolve our product with a full focus on the user and on delivering the best solution to ensure that your clusters are always compliant with the best practices.
